summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 2.3°C) and outside temperature (down 1.7°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 736 m) and light levels (up 9901 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 11957 lux), cloud levels (up 1435 m), feels like temperature (up 4.3°C), and outside temperature (up 3.3°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 735.5m lower than yesterday, 542.6m lower than the past week, 1434.7m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 745m to a maximum of 3580m, averaging 1250.9m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 1793.5m and 2690m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: Partial cloudiness with some periods of sun.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; moderate and mild. Also, air moisture should feel ok. Showers, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and some sunny spells will occur. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
